mapper.select: SELECT distinct b.task_no as taskNo, b.task_name as taskName, b.orderName, replace(a.realSitTime,'-','') as realSitTime, replace(replace(b.planSitDate,'-',''),'/','') as planSitDate, b.fdevGroupId, r.DATE as rollBackTime, r.ROLLBACK_OPR as rollbackOpr, r.REASON as reason, b.fdev_new as fdevNew FROM ( SELECT distinct task_no, task_name, orderName, planSitDate, fdevGroupId, fdev_new FROM ( SELECT w.main_task_name as orderName, w.FDEV_GROUP_ID as fdevGroupId, replace(sit_date,'/','-')as planSitDate, t.task_name, t.task_no, w.fdev_new FROM work_order w JOIN task_list t ON w.work_no = t.work_no WHERE w.sit_date is not null and w.FDEV_GROUP_ID is not null and w.work_stage != '11' AND w.order_type = 'function' UNION SELECT main_task_name as orderName, fdev_group_id as fdevGroupId, replace(sit_date,'/','-')as planSitDate, main_task_name as task_name, main_task_no as task_no, fdev_new FROM work_order WHERE main_task_no is not null and main_task_no != '' and sit_date is not null and FDEV_GROUP_ID is not null and work_stage != '11' AND order_type = 'function' ) k group by task_no ) b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT distinct TASK_NO, left(min(CREATE_TIME),10) as realSitTime FROM FTMS_SUBMIT_SIT_RECORD group by TASK_NO ) a ON a.TASK_NO = b.TASK_NO LEFT JOIN FTMS_ROLLBACK_INFO r ON b.task_no = r.FDEV_TASK_NO

select a.fdev_group_id as fdevGroupId, replace(a.exeTime,'-','') as exeTime, count(a.exeTime) as times from ( SELECT w.fdev_group_id, left(r.DATE, 10) as exeTime FROM FTMS_TESTCASE_EXE_RECORD r, work_order w where r.WORK_NO = w.work_no and fdev_group_id is not null AND w.order_type = 'function' ) a group by a.exeTime,a.fdev_group_id

SELECT distinct b.task_no as taskNo, b.task_name as taskName, b.orderName, replace(a.realSitTime,'-','') as realSitTime, replace(replace(b.planSitDate,'-',''),'/','') as planSitDate, b.fdevGroupId, r.DATE as rollBackTime, r.ROLLBACK_OPR as rollbackOpr, b.fdev_new as fdevNew FROM ( SELECT distinct task_no, task_name, orderName, planSitDate, fdevGroupId, fdev_new FROM ( SELECT w.main_task_name as orderName, w.FDEV_GROUP_ID as fdevGroupId, replace(sit_date,'/','-')as planSitDate, t.task_name, t.task_no, w.fdev_new FROM work_order w JOIN task_list t ON w.work_no = t.work_no WHERE w.sit_date is not null and w.FDEV_GROUP_ID is not null and w.work_stage != '11' UNION SELECT main_task_name as orderName, fdev_group_id as fdevGroupId, replace(sit_date,'/','-')as planSitDate, main_task_name as task_name, main_task_no as task_no, fdev_new FROM work_order WHERE main_task_no is not null and main_task_no != '' and sit_date is not null and FDEV_GROUP_ID is not null and work_stage != '11' ) k group by task_no ) b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT distinct TASK_NO, left(min(CREATE_TIME),10) as realSitTime FROM FTMS_SUBMIT_SIT_RECORD group by TASK_NO ) a ON a.TASK_NO = b.TASK_NO LEFT JOIN FTMS_ROLLBACK_INFO r ON b.task_no = r.FDEV_TASK_NO
